text: @RealJamesWoods People assume antibodies always confer immunity. That’s a fallacy.  They indicate previous infection, and titer can aid in disease mitigation and potential immunity. We have no idea where antibodies for COVID19 stand, or what appreciable titer levels need to be.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Actor
domain.description: An actor or actress in the world, like Kate Winslet or Leonardo DiCaprio
